title: PBE Sign Up Error 500 EUW
body:
Hello, i've tried today to check if I was still getting applied (I've requested it like 5 years ago, and I still haven't received any mail so I tried to check my status but I couldn't since I kept getting the error 500 thing.

I've tried to do this in multiple browsers and it didn't work
I've also tried to login from the EU page and than go directly to: p b e s i g n u p . e u w . l e a g u e o f l e g e n d s . c o m / e n / p b e 

Could anyone help me with this? since I really want a PBE account so I can try the new sandbox mode.

(Please note: I've never been banned, no chat restrictions or anything, I always try to be as positive as possible)

replies.body: Yup, as *Kiak1* mentioned, you should be able to bypass this error by using a VPN such as [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) to resolve this. Let me know if this helped!
Not OP but this isn't working for me either.{{item:3070}}   Mine takes quite a long while to load too, using cyberghost and a vpn in dallas, texas.  Should I change it to somewhere outside NA?

The same topic is already being discussed [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Gr84YzA0-pbe-error-500)... There is a possible solution, to use a VPN, but it didnt work for me although it seemed to have worked for some... You could try that...

Kiak1
